markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rokoan Arts](/Feats.aspx?ID=2654) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 137 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Ancestral spirits have begun to bond themselves to you, granting you powers characteristic of a rokoa. You can cast [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293) and [_status_](/Spells.aspx?ID=308) as primal innate spells once per day each.
name: Rokoan Arts
